name: Haywire Toy Factory
description:
Haywire Toy Factory

Submission For GTMK Jam 2020

Interpretation Of Theme (Out of Control): A platform creating robot gone out of control. 

You're a toy robot in a magical toy factory. But unfortunately the platform creating robot has gone haywire and has been creating self destructing platform all willy-nilly. Your goal is to survive this for as long as you can by staying on the platform. 

-By Sohrab Hamza (Programming) and Niyaz Badar (Graphics and Game Design)

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or A D to turn.
  • Space to Jump
  • R to reset
